notes.body: Hello,       Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern regarding the mail.  I would like to inform you that we only export in pan-India. We regret the disappointment caused to you. Please note that in the future, if we expand our serviceability, you will be notified accordingly.  You may place a new order from the PharmEasy application or website, www.pharmeasy.in, or you may call us at  999 29 999 29 and press 1 to place an order. If the medicine is available, it will be delivered to you. Please note that the orders can only be placed from an Indian registered mobile number.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

With regards to your order #656535636599001088-60849, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

notes.body: Hello Dr. Md Shahnawaz,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  We understand your concern in regard to order #654682627221487616-94697.       As per your request, the order will be marked as cancelled within 24-72 hours. A refund of Rs. 763.40 is initiated to your account. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this.      Please note that the refund might not be shown in the UPI account, and the same is credited to your bank account. Kindly check your bank account and wait till the above timeframe.     We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.    For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Dr. Md Shahnawaz,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand your concern in regard to order #654682627221487616-94697.  

As per your request, the order will be marked as cancelled within 24-72 hours. A refund of Rs. 763.40 is initiated to your account. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. 

Please note that the refund might not be shown in the UPI account, and the same is credited to your bank account. Kindly check your bank account and wait till the above timeframe.
 
We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.
 
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Purushottam,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      This email is with reference to the concern raised about the payment failure for your order #657060769995333632-45208.     As per the records, your order was cancelled on 08th December 2025. I apologise for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.     I would request that you place a new order and allow us to serve you. We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     Please be informed that at times, due to network issues, you may face such technical issues. As a quick fix, I request you to clear your browsing cookies, cache and reinstall your PharmEasy application and connect to a stable network. If you face any difficulty while operating it, please get back to us with an error screenshot so that we can check the same and assist you better.      I request you to use the other online payment mode option from the App/ Website. Also, you can use multiple online payment offers available there, through which you can save more.  ​   Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Purushottam,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

This email is with reference to the concern raised about the payment failure for your order #657060769995333632-45208.

As per the records, your order was cancelled on 08th December 2025. I apologise for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.

I would request that you place a new order and allow us to serve you. We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

Please be informed that at times, due to network issues, you may face such technical issues. As a quick fix, I request you to clear your browsing cookies, cache and reinstall your PharmEasy application and connect to a stable network. If you face any difficulty while operating it, please get back to us with an error screenshot so that we can check the same and assist you better. 

I request you to use the other online payment mode option from the App/ Website. Also, you can use multiple online payment offers available there, through which you can save more.
​
Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body_html:
Hello J Doshi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656941246235451392-86475.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #653434711665516544-90979. 
 
We can see that your order was canceled on 12 December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
We would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.2790.81/- initiated on 12 December 2025 and same will be refunded to your source account within 5-7 business days.
 
We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.
 
Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

PharmEasy

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of theCETAPHIL BABY GENTLE WASH & SHAMPOO | TEAR & SOAP FREE | 230 ML on 13th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your origibnal source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body: Hello Mrudula,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   I understand your concern with regard to the 657076471095533568-56437. I will surely assist you with this.     The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.     Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.     As reviewed, you had applied the coupon code MAXCURE. According to the terms, this coupon offers 21% off on allopathic medicines for orders with a cart MRP above Rs. 2000 (with a maximum benefit of Rs. 350). Additionally, PLUS members are eligible for an extra 5% in PharmEasy Credits.  ​   In your order, a total discount of 18.09% (including product-level, PharmEasy credits, PharmEasy Plus cashback and coupon discount) was successfully applied on the MRP.  ​   ​Please note that PharmEasy Plus members receive Plus cashback.  ​   As per our records, your order was cancelled on 08th December 2025 at 10:40 PM, and therefore, the discount benefits are no longer applicable.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Mrudula,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
I understand your concern with regard to the 657076471095533568-56437. I will surely assist you with this.

The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.

Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.

As reviewed, you had applied the coupon code MAXCURE. According to the terms, this coupon offers 21% off on allopathic medicines for orders with a cart MRP above Rs. 2000 (with a maximum benefit of Rs. 350). Additionally, PLUS members are eligible for an extra 5% in PharmEasy Credits.
​
In your order, a total discount of 18.09% (including product-level, PharmEasy credits, PharmEasy Plus cashback and coupon discount) was successfully applied on the MRP.
​
​Please note that PharmEasy Plus members receive Plus cashback.
​
As per our records, your order was cancelled on 08th December 2025 at 10:40 PM, and therefore, the discount benefits are no longer applicable.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Vineet,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regard to your order #656633605409505280, I can see the requested medicine was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure that all the rest of the medicines are delivered to you.     I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine. I am sorry for the unpleasant experience that you had with our platform. It was never our intention to upset you by any means.     Also, I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.     As per our records, your refund of Rs. 390.08 was initiated on 09th November 2025. You will receive the refund to your payment source within 5 to 7 business days. Please note that Saturdays, Sundays, and bank holidays are not considered business days.     You can track your refund via the ARN number: 1765252808044848b8bd.     If I misunderstood your concern, I request you to elaborate on your concern so we will be able to assist you better.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Team,
This is to bring to your notice, that I have been ordering medicine since last 3/4 years and every time I order I received a confirmation call from your customer care in which below questions.
1) They insist me to go for generic medicine instead of which I ordered. While ordering the medicine this already get highlighted which I had skipped.2) Than they try to sell some more medicine which is not required.3) Than they suggest some blood test.
They keep on calling from some numbers which shows as SPAM on our phone and till we receive the call they keep the order on hold because of which medicine are getting delivered late too.
Now this is getting very frustrating and I don’t  want such calls again and again.
Kindly suggest how to order without this confirmation call or else I will have to get this medicine from local shop. This much discounts are available here too.
I understand if Dr. is calling for some new medicine is order but this all medicine are repetitive and I don’t need this repetitive calls.
Thanks & Regards
Suhel Shaikh9930006083

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Confirmation Call - Issue
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi Team,

This is to bring to your notice, that I have been ordering medicine since last 3/4 years and every time I order I received a confirmation call from your customer care in which below questions.

1) They insist me to go for generic medicine instead of which I ordered. While ordering the medicine this already get highlighted which I had skipped.
2) Than they try to sell some more medicine which is not required.
3) Than they suggest some blood test.

They keep on calling from some numbers which shows as SPAM on our phone and till we receive the call they keep the order on hold because of which medicine are getting delivered late too.

Now this is getting very frustrating and I don’t  want such calls again and again.

Kindly suggest how to order without this confirmation call or else I will have to get this medicine from local shop. This much discounts are available here too.

I understand if Dr. is calling for some new medicine is order but this all medicine are repetitive and I don’t need this repetitive calls.

Thanks & Regards

Suhel Shaikh

notes.body: Hello Suhel,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I tried to reach you earlier today at 11:21 AM on 9930006083, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.     I understand your concern regarding the order confirmation call, and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.     Please note that we are unable to stop the order confirmation call, as this call is essential to verify the medicines and quantities placed in the order.     However, with regard to upselling calls for alternative medicines or diagnostic services, I have forwarded your request, and these calls will be blocked for you.     Regarding your order #657063883747655680-24605, I see your order is at the confirmation stage. Our pharmacist tried to call you for your order confirmation. However, he was unable to connect with you.      I have arranged a callback from our order confirmation team on your registered mobile number. I would request you to answer the call so that the order could be processed further. Your order is estimated to be delivered to you within the timeline of 11th December 2025.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha

 As mentioned my grandmother who is at home always says that no one has come to the door & asked for the OTP so how come these 2 delivery persons are saying they have returned back because they didn't get the OTP⁉️

Hello Santanu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the order ID 656633605409505280-90249. I will surely assist you with this.

Please be informed that the order is confirmed and cannot be modified at this stage. Hence, we are unable to upload the prescription to the existing order. If you wish, you can place a new order with the prescription.

You also have an option to place an order via prescription. You may follow the steps below to place an order by prescription.

  • Select a delivery address or add a new address.
  • Select the payment method and place an order.

I can see your order is in process and the medicines are being arranged. The estimated delivery date is 10th December 2025.

notes.body: Hello Mohit,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  Please note that the patient’s name and doctor’s name on the invoice will be mentioned as per the name on the prescription. The invoice for prescription not required medicines will be made in the name of whom the order is placed. You can add/modify the patient name by going to your account and then edit/add the new name under "Manage Address"(on the PharmEasy app/website). In the future, please place the order in the patient's name to avoid any issues.     Please reach out to us once the order is delivered(within 30 days), and if you have any concerns with the invoice.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Mohit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Please note that the patient’s name and doctor’s name on the invoice will be mentioned as per the name on the prescription. The invoice for prescription not required medicines will be made in the name of whom the order is placed. You can add/modify the patient name by going to your account and then edit/add the new name under "Manage Address"(on the PharmEasy app/website). In the future, please place the order in the patient's name to avoid any issues.

Please reach out to us once the order is delivered(within 30 days), and if you have any concerns with the invoice.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

notes.body:
Hello Reshma, 
   
 Greetings from PharmEasy! 
   
 This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656891170311667712-86305. 
   
 We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future. 
   
 Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare. 
   
 Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 09 December 2025. 
   
 We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future. 
   
 For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.  
   
 Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead! 
   
 Regards,  
 PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Reshma,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656891170311667712-86305.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 09 December 2025.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Yash,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the prescription deletion request. I will surely assist you with this.  Unfortunately, we are unable to delete any prescription details from your account once they have been uploaded. These records are retained to ensure accuracy and compliance with our order processing procedures.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Yash,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the prescription deletion request. I will surely assist you with this.

Unfortunately, we are unable to delete any prescription details from your account once they have been uploaded. These records are retained to ensure accuracy and compliance with our order processing procedures.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.
